message: Let's be fair and split it 60-40, I'm the one making the first offer after all!
Let's be more fair this time. I'll take a slight advantage since I'm the one making the offer now.
I'm still willing to compromise, but I think I deserve a bit more than you offered. How about 58-42?
I'm willing to give you a little more, but I still need to get a better deal than your last offer. How about 55-45?
I see we're getting closer, but I still think I can get a bit more. How about we meet in the middle of our last offers?
I think we're both being a little stubborn.  I'm going to increase my offer slightly, but let's make a deal before the value of this money drops too much.
